alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Douglas; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:23AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Douglas, western Taney, eastern Christian, central Stone and east central Barry Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Highlandville to near Galena to 8 miles east of Cassville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock Lake, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Kimberling City, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Sparta, Shell Knob, Kissee Mills, Reeds Spring, Highlandville, Rockaway Beach, Fremont Hills and Bull Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
